attributes.action: End diagnosis of mental health conditions in children and adolescents
attributes.additional_details:
For years now, children and adolescents have been subjected to diagnosis of mental health conditions, such as Asperger's Syndrome and ADHD.
 A mental health diagnosis should only be performed if a child or adolescent is physically or psychologically violent towards others.
 This petition calls on the Department of Health to stop this ludicrous notion of labelling youngsters with mental health disorders.
